title: Does the City of Wilmington have anyone who does any maintenance of the Cross City Trail? In places, grass is growing onto the pavement. Some places have tree limbs that are so low that bike riders hit their heads on them. Before removing the Eastwood Road bike path pavement for the drainage project, the grass was growing over half the pavement in places. The path needs a regular spraying of weed killer along the edges.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=11929
